name: sammiches
text: You must remember to fear Ricky Nihoha. It's so...important.

name: nurdbot
text: He's the only example of a remotely normal Squirrel in Achewood. In other words, yes. We will easily remember Ricky.

name: tekende
text: I dunno, Blister seems pretty normal, aside from the fact that he's dead.

name: pie4me6
text: TALKING LIKE THIS ALL THE TIME IS COMPLETELY NORMAL!

name: fady
text: WELL YEAH MAN WHERE YOU FROM WHERE THAT AIN'T NORMAL WHISPERISTAN?

name: unsentletter
text: Lesson : Do not anger Tongans. Respect they salad.

name: norsef
text:
I like the idea that the only bad thing Todd has done around Ricky is eat all the salad.
You can tell he's on his best behaviour to impress everyone in the club.

He had to do extra jobs to pay for his van afterall.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: I never knew squirrels were believers in bean salad before. It goes against everything I was taught.

name: closefriend
text: A comment left by closefriend was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by apocowarg, sevenarts, Ketters, ThreeBong)

name: zheroen
text: I wish to see more of this Ricky Nihoha.  He deserves better than to end up a Milklin-esque one-off character.

name: wolfslice
text: "Milklin-esque" haha. Chubby.

name: threebong
text: Todd is under appreciated.

name: huber
text: Todd is brilliant. I think we need to form an Achewood union and lobby Onstad for a Todd t-shirt.

text:
That's Todd.
I know him.

text: Todd is completely addicted to horrible drugs.

text: Someday, sir, you will have all the chubbies you gloriously deserve for this.

name: ethelthefrog
text: I enjoy Todd Todd Todd Todd Todd T. Squirrel's contributions to the Achewood universe immensely.

name: dwodles
text: THERE IS NO SUCH THING AS "TOO MUCH TODD".

name: mortshire
text: todd's blackout progression is illustrated beautifully.  it's like chris ware good.

name: billyamericana
text: That time Jesus beat Simon Peter's ass for hogging all the bread He made for the third Sabbath in a row is legendary; I think it was the first instance of the piledriver, even

name: clocked
text:
"i'm havin' a fantasy!"

i need to remember to say this next time i'm stoned

name: epicurus
text: The RIcky Nihoha sidebar is amazing.

name: riazm
text:
Todd is surprised whenever he wakes up:

"Holy frick! I woke up again!"

name: ceokasen
text:
It's the most amusing part of the flowchart to me: That Todd's continued existence comes as a shocker to him.

... I get the feeling he severely caught the "live every day as though it were his last" meme - and although, occasionally, this happens - it does explain why he spends most of his waking hours high as a kite in a tornado on Jupiter; only listens to DOUBLE MUSIC, and why his method of STD handling is "Not Giving A Shit." Who cares about festering sores when you could very well be dead tomorrow and can have fun today?

...And then back in a couple months by answering a riddle on the back of a menu in a cheap restaraunt in Hell.

...Well, at least he's not taking his functional immortality for granted.

name: invidious
text: No, the funniest part is that Todd takes bets as to whether or not he'll survive until tomorrow morning.

name: xud
text: Does that bong thing really work?

name: red_dawn
text: Maybe it does if you weigh a 1/3 lbs, or whatever it is Todd weighs.

name: m1st3rbl4ck
text: i say "oh wow i'm having a fantasy.. it's so frickin' sweet... it's so... important" all the time when i'm drunk. it's kind of embarassing.

name: babachewy
text:
Todd's a world-class genius when it comes to shanking, cusses, and scrounging up free highs.

Todd strips are like an old Indian man stopping you on the sidewalk, reaching into a nearby dead tree and pulling out an orphaned baby bird. Only with drugs.

name: riazm
text: I...I don't know what you just said but...say more of it.

name: woodenteeth
text: Fensler Film GI Joes. If you haven't seen them, you may miss the reference here. Go and find them. Oh god please go RIGHT AWAY.

name: unsentletter
text: "hey kid... I'm a computer."

name: woodenteeth
text: stop all the downloadin'

text:
I do no much bout computers cept this one I got at my house an my mom put some games on there an I play em-

ZUEELOROUZORLORORD

text: Oh there is no way in hell I was cribbing off some tired internet thing NO WAY

name: woodenteeth
text:
Oh. Well then. Sorry that your image there brought back fond memories...

oh great....

now unsentletter is [i]crying[i/].

name: babachewy
text:
Your tears they are... the rain of all of our fears?

*a rose petal falls into a dying man's bourbon*

name: woodenteeth
text: he looks up to see the naked teenager of his twisted broken dreams writhing on the ceiling of the bar.

name: jonmw
text: Todd would run a weekly show in which he is given a number of strange objects, and he must find a way to get high off them.

name: anitrophaeron
text: Yay!  I love finding new jokes/levels in old comics.  I just realized the reason those fuckers owe Todd five bucks is that he made a bet with them about sleep death.

name: nigelchaos
text: Wow. You just took me to school in the SCHOOL BUS OF KNOWLEDGE... sigh.. I'll work on that one.

name: fosters
text: Yeah, I like noticing new things the second time around. I just realized what Todd meant by "now no one gets the bean salad" after vomiting.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Todd has come back from heaven addicted to horrible drugs.

name: mountaindewtab
text: todd is like the squirrel from ice age if he was a modern squirrel and not neurotic about acorns.

name: dasilodavi
text: Todd is the Macguyver of gettin' high.  Imagine if he aplied himself to something useful!

name: woodenteeth
text: All roads lead to [dense black square]

name: catgrl131
text: Except when it leads to nobody getting the bean salad now.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: which really is a dense black square if you think about it.

name: snowman
text: not a huge fan of these flowcharts, for some reason...

name: anitrophaeron
text: It is lame to not like everything.

name: baryonyx
text: Todd's fantasy illustrates perfectly why I hate Todd.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: housewife
text: Beautiful

name: aidens123
text: Sometimes it's a small metal Ratt that everyone forgot about.

name: bebby
text: Todd is the man, yes, but how dare he have a terrible cocaine addiction at Philippe's birthday party.

name: howl
text: But then it turned out he didn't!

name: deusoma
text: I love how completely enthralled he is by the imaginary giant metal flip-off. Actually, after much introspection, I realized I would pay a surprising amount to have such a flip-off on my lawn.

name: dipstikk
text: I imagine Todd to have this medium-high pitched voice with a strong New Jersey accent, all stuttering and being a spaz.

name: snookybutts
text: "It's so...important" sums up my thought process every time I did drugs
